price: 216. Y si te desobedecen, diles: “No tengo nada que ver con lo que hacen”.
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
